mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, password, email, first_name, last_name from Users where user_id = #{userId}
select user_id, user_name, password, email, first_name,last_name from Users where user_name=#{userName}
mapper.insert: insert into Users(user_id, user_name, password, email, first_name,last_name) values(#{userId}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{email}, #{firstName}, #{lastName})
mapper.update: update Users set user_name=#{userName}, password=#{password}, email=#{email}, first_name=#{firstName}, last_name=#{lastName} where user_id=#{userId}
